titleStmt.title: A Testimony from the people of God called Quakers against many lying and slanderous books and a ballad lately published in envy and malice to render the said people odious, and accusing them of things they are clear of.

notesStmt.note: "London the 11th of the 2d month, 1670, from the people of God, called Quakers, and is to go abroad in all cities, towns, and countries where those lying pamphlets and ballads have been spread."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
